name: Heroes of the Storm - Hero Best Talent Build

talents.name: Reanimation: Every Regeneration Globe gathered increases your Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second, even during Undying.  You also gain the ability to gather Regeneration Globes while Undying.
Fealty Unto Death: When a nearby Minion dies, you gain 1% of your maximum Health and 5 Mana, even while Undying.
Ossein Renewal: Activate to heal 20% of your maximum life over 6 seconds. Can be used while Undying to revive faster.
March of the Black King: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 7.03% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 200 (+10 per level) damage.
Burning Rage: Deal 10 damage per second to nearby enemies.
Consume Vitality: Skeletal Swing heals you for 2% of your maximum Health per target hit, up to 10%. Effective while Undying.
Spectral Leech: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal you for the same amount.
Death Ritual: Permanently gain 5 Health and 3 Mana when a Minion dies under Voodoo Ritual.
Spider Cluster: Corpse Spiders creates 3 more spiders over 3 seconds.
Gidbinn: Increases the explosion area of Plague Toads and the duration of your Zombie Wall and Corpse Spiders by 25%.

Gargantuan: Summon a Gargantuan that guards you for 20 seconds. Deals 30 (+15 per level) damage to nearby enemies when summoned, attacks for 100 (+20 per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp, dealing 30 (+15 per level) damage. The Gargantuan deals extra damage to Minions and Structures.
Sprint: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
Leaping Spiders: Corpse Spiders leap at their targets and deal 25% more damage.
Fury of the Storm: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 20 damage to the target, and 20 damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.
Deep Chill: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 35%.
Snowstorm: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.
Frostbitten: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

Summon Water Elemental: Summons a Water Elemental at target location, dealing 65 (+7 per level) damage and Chilling nearby enemies. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 50 (+6 per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.
Improved Ice Block: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.
Northern Exposure: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold are also afflicted with Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25% for 2 seconds.
Bolt of the Storm: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
Viking Bribery: Kill enemy Minions to gain stacks of Bribe.  Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Bosses.  Maximum stacks available: 100.
Erik the Swift: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 15 (+3 per level) Health per second.
Spin To Win!: Activate to have each Viking deal 42 (+9 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Play Again!: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. 
Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.
Jump!: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Large and In Charge: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

Fury of the Storm: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 10 (+4 per level) damage to the target, and 10 (+11 per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.
Block: Periodically reduces the damage received from Hero Basic Attacks by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
Living The Dream: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Every 5 seconds Murky is alive he gains 1% more Ability Power, to a maximum of 15% extra. These stacks are lost on death.
Slime Advantage: Your Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage to Slimed targets.
Octo-Grab: Summon an octopus to stun target enemy Hero for 3.0625 seconds while you hit them for 1 damage a second.
Wrath of Cod: Increase Pufferfish's damage by 35% against Slimed targets.
Slimy Pufferfish: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.
... And A Shark Too!: Increases the damage of Octo-Grab by 10000% (+1000% per level).
Knight Takes Pawn: Condemn deals 80 (+20 per level) additional damage to Minions and Mercenaries and stuns them for 4 seconds.

Laws of Hope: Regenerate 1 Health per second.
Activate to heal 20% of your max Health over 4 seconds.
Conviction: Condemn increases your Movement Speed by 25% for 1 second.

Blessed Shield: Deal 70 (+9 per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 2 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 35 (+4.5 per level) damage and stunning them for 1 second.
Burning Rage: Deal 10 damage per second to nearby enemies.
Blessed Hammer: Condemn also creates a hammer that spirals around you, dealing 40 (+2.5 per level) damage to enemies it hits.
Indestructible: Upon taking fatal damage, gain a Shield equal to your maximum Health for 5 seconds. This ability has a 120 second cooldown.
Reconstitution: Health Restoration bonus on Creep increased by 200%.
Envenomed Spines: Basic Attacks have their range increased by 20% and deal an additional 15 (+3 per level) damage over 3 seconds.
Battle Momentum: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
Devouring Maw: Summons a Devouring Maw that deals 75 (+24 per level) damage and devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 38 (+2 per level) damage per second.
Mutalisk: Your Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk with a bounce attack and 50% increased duration.
Brood Expansion: Can hold up to 2 charges of Hunter Killer.
Bolt of the Storm: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
Timeless Creature: Increases the duration of Cloud Serpent by 50%.
Mending Serpent: Cloud Serpent heals the friendly unit for 15 (+1.65 per level) Health each time it attacks.
Lightning Serpent: Cloud Serpent's attacks bounce to 3 nearby enemy targets, dealing 10 (+1.1 per level) damage each.
Jug of 1,000 Cups: Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing Heroes, restoring a total of 480 (+156 per level) Health over 6 seconds.
Hindering Winds: Blinding Wind also slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.
Serpent Sidekick: You also gain a Cloud Serpent whenever you cast it on another ally.
Kung Fu Hustle: Abilities recharge two and a half times as fast while Fast Feet is active.
Conjurer's Pursuit: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Mana Regeneration by 0.1015 per second.
Protective Shield: Activate to shield an allied Hero for 15% of their max Health for 5 seconds.
Cleanse: Activate to remove all stuns, roots, silences, and slows from the target and prevents their reapplication for 1 second.
Divine Shield: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
Shrink Ray: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.
Benediction: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of your next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.
Storm Shield: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
Regeneration Master: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
Focused Attack: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack deals 75% additional damage.  Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
Follow Through: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
Void Prison: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.
Wormhole: For 3 seconds, you can activate Blink again to return to the point where it was cast from.
Rending Cleave: Cleave deals an additional 50% damage over 5 seconds.
Nexus Blades: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
Mana Addict: Increase your maximum Mana by 15 when you pick up a Regeneration Globe.
Gathering Power: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Each Hero takedown increases this bonus by 2% to a maximum of 15%. This bonus Ability Power is reset to 5% on death.
Fission Bomb: Increases Living Bomb's explosion damage by 75%.

Phoenix: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 10 (+8 per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 10 (+8 per level) damage and splashing for 50%.
Chain Bomb: Living Bomb's explosion applies Living Bomb to enemies not already affected by it.
Ignite: Flamestrike also applies Living Bomb to Heroes not already affected by it.
Rebirth: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. You may order the Phoenix to move to a different location once while the Phoenix is alive.
Victuals: Heal for 3% of your Maximum Health when you collect Fresh Meat. Meat continues to drop at maximum stacks.
Cheap Shot: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a slow, root, or stun.
Abattoir: Increases the maximum number of Fresh Meat to 35, and you only lose half upon death.

Lamb to the Slaughter: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay.  This deals 75 (+15 per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post for 4 seconds.
Crave Flesh: While an enemy is affected by Butcher's Brand, you gain 30% Movement Speed.
Blood Frenzy: Fresh Meat also increases your Attack Speed by 1% per stack.
Nexus Blades: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
Taste for Blood: Enemies killed by Globe of Annihilation's impact permanently increase its damage by 2 up to a maximum of 500.
Bound Minion: Using General of Hell on a Lane Minion decreases the non-Heroic damage they take by -24% and increases the damage they deal to non-Heroic targets by 100%. Lasts 30 seconds.
Infernal Globe: Reduces the cast and travel time by 40% and deals an additional 12 (+3 per level) damage over 4 seconds.
Black Pool: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.
March of Sin: Azmodan can move at 75% speed while channeling All Shall Burn.
Blood for Blood: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
Fifth Circle: Azmodan and other empowered ally attacks and Abilities slow Movement and Attack Speeds by 40% for 3 seconds.
Moonburn: Increases Moonfire's damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 100%.
Elune's Grace: Increases the range of Regrowth, Moonfire, and Entangling Roots by 30%.
Enduring Growth: Increases the duration of Regrowth by 6 seconds.
Tranquility: Heals 20 (+9 per level) Health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.
Life Seed: Nearby damaged allied Heroes will automatically gain the heal over time portion of Regrowth. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.
Tenacious Roots: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.5 seconds longer.
Storm Shield: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
Regeneration Master: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
Legion of Beetles: Anub'arak automatically spawns Beetles every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.
Leeching Scarabs: Beetles heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

Locust Swarm: Duration: 8 seconds
Deal 16 (+6.4 per level) damage per second in an area around Anub'arak. Each enemy damaged heals Anub'arak for 10 (+1.5 per level) health.
Burning Rage: Deal 10 damage per second to nearby enemies.
Imposing Presence: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 50%.

Hive Master: Anub'arak gains a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 16 (+16 per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 20 (+3 per level) health.
Purge Evil: Smite deals 25% more damage to Heroes.
Amplified Healing: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.
Battle Momentum: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
Judgment: Charge target enemy Hero, dealing 60 (+8 per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. While charging, nearby enemies are knocked back and take 30 (+4 per level) damage.
Burning Rage: Deal 10 damage per second to nearby enemies.
Blood for Blood: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
Nexus Blades: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
Rabid Wolves: Damaging Heroes with Feral Spirit grants 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
Envenom: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 179.96 damage over 10 seconds.
Wind Shear: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.
Sundering: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line. Deals 160 (+22 per level) damage and shoves enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
Grace Of Air: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
Tempest Fury: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.
Nexus Blades: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
Scrap-o-Matic Smelter: Increases the amount of Mana restored by scrap to 60.
Reduce, Reuse, Recycle: Enemy minions that die near you have a 15% chance to drop scrap.
Rock-It! Turret XL: Turrets attack up to 2 additonal targets for 50% damage.
Grav-o-bomb 3000: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 150 (+20 per level) damage.
Turret Storage: Max Turret charges increased to 3.
Long-Ranged Turrets: Turret range increased by 40%.
Miniature Black Hole: Grav-O-Bomb radius increased by 25% and damage increased by 50%.
Barbed Shot: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries.
Envenom: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 179.96 damage over 10 seconds.
Unstable Poison: Minions and Mercenaries that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 75 (+9 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Wailing Arrow: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 140 (+18 per level) damage and Silencing enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.
Splinter Shot: Withering Fire hits a second target for 18.75 (+2.25 per level) damage.
Cold Embrace: Shadow Dagger makes enemies Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, but the range of Shadow Dagger is reduced by 25%.
Deafening Blast: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.
Seasoned Marksman: For every 6 enemy Minion or Mercenary kills near your Hero, gain 1 Basic Attack damage. Hero Takedowns count as 2 Minion kills.
Focused Attack: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack deals 75% additional damage.  Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
Revolution Overdrive: Gain 10% Movement Speed while affected by Inspire.  Increase this bonus by 5% for each allied Hero nearby when Inspire is cast.

Hyperion: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 25 (+6 per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 300 (+72 per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.
Giant Killer: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
Bullseye: The first enemy hit by Penetrating Round is stunned for 1 second and takes 50% more damage.
Nexus Frenzy: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.
Ambush Snipe: Increases Snipe's damage by 20% when used from Cloak or within one second of being Cloaked.
Gathering Power: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Each Hero takedown increases this bonus by 2% to a maximum of 15%. This bonus Ability Power is reset to 5% on death.
Anti-Armor Shells: Your Basic Attacks deal 250% damage, but your Attack Speed is proportionally slower.
Precision Strike: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 300 (+35 per level) damage in an area. Unlimited range.
Lethal Decoy: Holo Decoy now deals 25% of Nova's damage.
Double Fake: Casting Holo Decoy creates an additional Decoy at your current location.
Rewind: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
Spiritwalker's Grace: Reduces Chain Heal's Mana cost from 70 to 45.
Feral Heart: Increases Health and Mana Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form.
Earth Shield: Lightning Shield also gives the ally a Shield that absorbs 75 damage over 3 seconds.
Ancestral Healing: After a short delay, heals target allied Hero for 600 (+140 per level).
Healing Surge: Increases Chain Heal's healing on the primary target by 25% and heal an additional target.
Lightning Bond: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts it on you, including any talent bonuses.
Storm Shield: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
Armor Piercing Rounds: Overkill's damage to the primary target increased by 20%.
Spray 'n' Pray: Overkill's range increased by 15%.
First Aid: Activate to heal 11.07% of your max Health over 6 seconds.
Drakken Laser Drill: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 30 (+14 per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.
Lead Rain: Overkill applies a stacking slow, up to 20%.
Lock and Load: While the Minigun is wound up, gain 15% increased Move Speed.
Focusing Diodes: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increased damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.
Ranger's Mark: Lower the Cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 8 seconds.
Protective Shield: Activate to shield an allied Hero for 15% of their max Health for 5 seconds.
Lunar Blaze: Increases the range of Lunar Flare by 50%.
Starfall: Deal 20 (+6 per level) damage per second and slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 8 seconds.
Sprint: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
Shooting Star: Lunar Flare deals 50% more damage and refunds all Mana if you hit an enemy Hero.
Rewind: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
Siphoning Arrow: 50% of the damage dealt by Hungering Arrow is returned as Health to Valla.
Puncturing Arrow: Hungering Arrow range increased by 25% and the number of times it can bounce to 3.
Repeating Arrow: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.
Strafe: Rapidly attack nearby visible enemies for 15 (+6.75 per level) damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
Frost Shot: Multishot also slows by 40% for 2 seconds.
Blood for Blood: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
Bolt of the Storm: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
Power Throw: Increase the range of Hammerang by 40% and the slow duration by 25%.
Gathering Power: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Each Hero takedown increases this bonus by 2% to a maximum of 15%. This bonus Ability Power is reset to 5% on death.
Secret Weapon: Basic Attacks deal 80% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.
Hinterland Blast: After a short delay, deal 280 (+31 per level) damage to enemies within a long line.
Thunderstrikes: Lightning Rod deals 15% more damage each subsequent strike.
Hammer Time: Your first Basic Attack against a target slowed by Hammerang will stun them for 0.75 seconds.
Nexus Frenzy: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.
Reverberation: Enemies hit by Thunder Clap have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 3 seconds.
Thunderburn: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds dealing 25 (+4 per level) damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.
Piercing Bolt: Penetrates through the first target hit, hitting 1 additional target.
Avatar: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 320 Health and causing your Basic Attacks to stun enemies.
Burning Rage: Deal 10 damage per second to nearby enemies.
Stoneform: Activate to heal for 50% of your maximum Health over 8 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.
Unstoppable Force: Increases the duration of Avatar by 30%, and the duration of Disables are reduced by 75% while in Avatar.
Regeneration Master: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
Destruction: Damage boost of Frostmourne Hungers increased to 150% damage.
Rune Tap: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals you for 3.12% of your max Health.
Summon Sindragosa: Deals 150 (+15 per level) damage, slows enemy Heroes, and freezes Minions for 10 seconds and Structures for 20 seconds.
Biting Cold: Frozen Tempest damage increased by 50%.
Frostmourne Feeds: Increased application to your next 2 Basic Attacks.
Absolute Zero: Sindragosa flies twice as far.  Enemy Heroes are rooted for 2 seconds, and then slowed by 60% for 2 seconds.
Pressurized Glands: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.
Adrenal Overload: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.
Calldown: MULE: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

Evolve Monstrosity: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 30 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from Minions and Structures.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.
Soma Transference: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 20 (+6 per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.
Envenomed Spikes: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.
Hivemind: Casting Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first. If the second host moves too far away, it is destroyed.
Advanced Artillery: Increase the damage bonus to long distance enemies by 10%.
Maelstrom Shells: Increase standard Basic Attack range by 20%.
First Aid: Activate to heal 11.07% of your max Health over 6 seconds.
Napalm Strike: Deals 40 (+16 per level) damage on impact. Additionally deals 30 (+4 per level) damage per second.  Lasts for 4 seconds.
Giant Killer: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
Graduating Range: While in Siege Mode your standard Basic Attack range increases by 20% every 3 seconds, up to 100%.
Advanced Lava Strike: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.
Sweeping Grasp: Increases the range of Primal Grasp by 20%.
Envenom: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 179.96 damage over 10 seconds.
Impaling Swarm: Impaling Blades spawns 2 Zerglings at the target location.

Summon Ultralisk: Summon an Ultralisk that attacks the target to deal 40 (+8 per level) damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for 50% damage. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Ultralisk. Lasts for 20 seconds.
Sprint: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
Blood for Blood: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
Nexus Blades: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
Shadow Shield: Evasion grants a 62.5 point Shield for 5 seconds.
Immolation: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 13 (+2.5 per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.
First Aid: Activate to heal 11.07% of your max Health over 6 seconds.
The Hunt: Charge to target unit, dealing 150 (+20 per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
Sixth Sense: Take 50% reduced damage from Abilities while Evasion is active.
Blood for Blood: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.
Nowhere to Hide: Grants global range.
Regeneration Master: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.
Amplified Healing: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.
Brewmaster's Balance: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 10 Health per second.

Storm, Earth, Fire: Split into three elemental spirits for 15.15 seconds, each with 50% of your maximum Health, and enables two new leaping attacks for use.
Storm attacks at range for 30 damage. 
Earth attacks slowly for 20 damage and slows enemies by 25%. 
Fire attacks quickly for 18 damage.
Enough to Share: Fortifying Brew also Shields nearby allied Heroes for 10 per second.
Pressure Point: Flying Kick slows the target enemy by 90% for 1 second.
Elemental Conduit: Using an Ability will cause one of the elemental spirits to fight with you for 4 seconds. Only one spirit can be active at a time.
War Paint: Basic Attacks heal you for 30% of the damage dealt.
Superiority: Reduce damage taken from Minions, Structures, and Mercenaries by 50%.
Poisoned Spear: Ancient Spear deals an additional 75% damage over 4 seconds.

Wrath of the Berserker: Increases damage dealt by 40%. Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.
Mystical Spear: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 4 seconds. You are pulled to the target location even if you don't hit an enemy.
Furious Blow: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 40%, but now costs 35 Fury.
Nexus Blades: Basic attacks deal 20% more damage and slow the target for 1 second.
Soul Feast: Black Soulstone increases your Health Regeneration by 3% per Soul.
Fire Devil: Fire Stomp also surrounds you in flames that deal 10 (+2 per level) damage every second for 6 seconds.
Soul Steal: Increases the amount of Health gained from Black Soulstone by 66%.
Lightning Breath: Become Unstoppable while channeling lightning that deals 320 (+72 per level) damage over 4 seconds.  The direction of the Lightning changes with your mouse cursor position.
Firestorm: Fire Stomp waves return to you, dealing 125% damage.
Imposing Presence: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 50%.
Hellstorm: Lightning Breath lasts and reaches 50% longer.
Hyper Shift: Every time you heal a Hero with Soothing Mist, reduce the cooldown of Phase Shift by 2 seconds.
Peekaboo!: Phase Shifting to an ally grants vision and reveals cloakers in a large area for 6 seconds.
Phase Shield: After finishing the teleport, the target of your Phase Shift gains a 200 point Shield for 20 seconds.
Blink Heal: Teleport to a nearby ally, healing them for 108 (+17 per level).  Can store 2 charges.
Shield Dust: Pixie Dust now reduces Ability damage taken by 50%.
Critterize: Polymorph causes targets to take 25% more damage.
Storm Shield: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
Pwn Shop Guitar: Reduces Guitar Solo's Mana cost by 40%.
Double-Necked Guitar: Increases Powerslide's width by 100% and you slide 30% faster.
Guitar Hero: While Guitar Solo is active, you heal for 50% of the damage dealt by Basic Attacks.
Mosh Pit: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
Show Stopper: Reduces all damage taken by 25% for 4 seconds after using Powerslide.
Speed Metal: Rockstar also gives 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
Tour Bus: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. You can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.
Conjurer's Pursuit: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Mana Regeneration by 0.1015 per second.
Healing Ward: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their max Health every second for 10 seconds.
Static Charge: Enemies damaged by Psionic Storm are marked with Static Charge. Your Basic Attacks consume the Static Charge to deal 24 (+4.5 per level) damage.
Archon: Transform into an Archon, gaining a 200 point Shield, causing Basic Attacks to deal 64 (+12 per level) damage and splash for 32 (+6 per level) additional damage. Lasts for 12 seconds.
Prescience: Dimensional Shift will automatically activate when you fall below 15% Health. This effect has a separate 45 second cooldown.
Dimensional Warp: While Dimensional Shifted, gain 50% Movement Speed and heal for 40 (+40 per level) Health.
Twilight Archon: Increases Archon's initial Shield, Attack Damage, and Basic Attack range by 35%.
Chew Your Food: Using Devour also heals you for 9.555% of your max Health over 3.0625 seconds.
Amplified Healing: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.
Tenderizer: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
Putrid Bile: Emit bile that deals 20 (+3 per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.
Relentless: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.
Fishing Hook: Hook has an additional 40% range.
Regenerative Bile: Putrid Bile lasts 2 seconds longer, grants an additional 10% Movement Speed and heals for 50% of the damage dealt.
